avvioBot: Hello! I am KryptoCoinBot and my job is to notify you of the change in the value of the cryptocurrencies that interest you! First, choose the language you prefer by pressing on the keyboard! (You can later change the it using the /lan {language} command). Currently the only languages supported are: Italian, English.
comandoLinguaSenzaParametro: The /lan command requires an additional parameter! e.g. /lan english
comandoLinguaTroppiParametri: You have entered too many parameters! the /lan command only needs one! e.g. /lan english
comandoLinguaParametriOrdinatiMale: Incorrect command, the order of the parameters is wrong
comandoLinguaerroreCambioLingua: I could not change the language, report the bug to @rhobby
comandoLinguaNonAncoraSupportata: This language is not supported yet... If you want to contribute to the translation contact @rhobby!
errore: An error occured! Please, report the error via /feeback {text} command!
